content: **buy any 2 patterns and get 20% off no codes are needed just put 2 or more patterns in your cart and the discount will be automatically applied to your purchase at checkout ** the pattern is written in english using **us** crochet terms *dorothea blanket is a beautiful textured granny square blanket very easy to make it can be made with any yarn in any size you can easily adjust the size of the squares simply by adding more rounds to the square you can also adjust the size of the blanket by adding more squares to the blanket this pattern is suitable for advanced or adventurous beginner who wants to explore new stitches and learn how to achieve a beautiful texture with only basic crochet stitches * **skill level ** advanced beginner - intermediate **crochet terminology ** the pattern is written in **english** using **us** crochet terms **crochet hook ** 3 mm **finished measurements ** 95cm x 95 cm 37 4 x 37 4 **yarn ** alize angora gold 100 g/550 m 3 58 oz/601 yds 80% acrylic 20% wool color ivory no 599 you ll need 4 skeins of 100 g **stitches used ** chain stitch chain st single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet magic_ring front post treble_crochet fptr and bobble stitch **the pattern is very detailed and it has ** - a row-by-row written pattern - a step-by-step picture tutorial with 80 pictures - a crochet chart for the square - a crochet chart for the border - a schematic - a stitch guide - information on material needed happy crocheting please when you make this blanket show it in your projects for others to see including me i m always very happy to see your beautiful work
